githubPullRequests.remotes: "githubPullRequests.queries": [ 	{ 		"label": "Waiting For My Review", 		"query": "is:open review-requested:${user}" 	}, 	{ 		"label": "Assigned To Me", 		"query": "is:open assignee:${user}" 	}, 	{ 		"label": "Created By Me", 		"query": "is:open author:${user}" 	}, 	{ 		"label": "Mentioned Me", 		"query": "is:open mentions:${user}" 	} ]
